Articles.Content: First of all, i really like the wheels. The only thing i don\'t k=like about them is that no matter what, you can drive forever with them because no fuel or power is used by them. I would love to see a link between them and solar panels (or battery).

Card, I like your suggesstion, and I\'ll take it into consideration. I\'m currently having trouble with my VAB tabs being too cluttered with parts. I just did a fresh install of KSP and I\'m reluctant to add mods and I certainly don\'t want to make my parts dependent on others.

Is there any chance that this mod will be made compatible with 0.15?

This mod is unique as it allows to move (very) large objects.

The author is still around, maybe send him a PM and ask.

Drew, about the parts tab clutter, have you considered using a mod manager to enable/disable various mod packs to limit what shows up to only what you actually will be using?

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Is there any chance that this mod will be made compatible with 0.15?

This mod is unique as it allows to move (very) large objects.

I am using it with 0.15 and it works fine.

I am using it with 0.15 and it works fine.

Are Kerbals silly? If so, i\'m feeling very Kerbal at the moment because you\'re absolutely right. :-[

I am using it with 0.15 and it works fine.

Are Kerbals silly? If so, i\'m feeling very Kerbal at the moment because you\'re absolutely right. :-[

Are Kerbals lucky? If so, I\'m feeling very Kerbal at the moment.

Are Kerbals lucky? If so, I\'m feeling very Kerbal at the moment.

Depends on your definition of lucky...
Is this working ok with 15.2.

Is this working ok with 15.2.

Try it yourself. I can\'t, for having BCD.

Broken Computer Disorder

Is this working ok with 15.2.

It is.
How can I speed up the wheels? They are a bit slow for some purposes.

How can I speed up the wheels? They are a bit slow for some purposes.

Add MOAR BOOSTERS.

Add MOAR BOOSTERS.

Not quite what I was looking for, hahaha.
I sense an ATHLETE in the making

This Addon still works fine in 0.16!

Are you still working on this drewmacrae, and if yes: what can we expect for the next update?

I love your wheels very much!
I really like using these wheels but I want to increase the speed. Help ?
Pressing h and n has higher speed than w and s, also, attaching an engine to the back of your rover increases the speed greatly. It also becomes very hard to steer, I recommend turning CAPS LOCK on.
sweet! thanks for the help!

Just made a small unmanned rover with your wheels, awesome handling. I just wish q and e weren't flipped :/

Weighs a bit less than 4 tons.

Noticed that with a previous rover design I actually did accelerate and decelerate it with h and n. Now that doesn't seem to work and steering is q/e to turn wasd/ijkl to drive (n works as a brake now). What could've caused the bugged controls? Cart plugin or something from this? No RCS on the rovers. I'm using advanced brakes but it doesn't seem to work very well.

Edited August 20, 2012 by heikkik
typos
Will there ever be an update to this where I can attach it to the undersides of spaceplanes? This wheel would be great for use as a taxi wheel.

Will there ever be an update to this where I can attach it to the undersides of spaceplanes? This wheel would be great for use as a taxi wheel.

It does work in 0.16 if that is what you are wondering.

The wheels are best suited for slow moving vehicles and can be a bit tricky to steer.
yay that this, a relatively old plugin, still works!
Tested in 0.17 and still works. Top speed appears to be 7m/s after the rescale. The .cfg files can be edited to change top speed.
fantastic mod but only the legs is too short, not really useful when your creation have a rocket under it.
